name: Float (itch) (LazyBriefcase)
description:
This game was created for Mix and Game Jam 2019 by Ryan Staudacher and Ryan Carpenter.

The mechanic that we chose to use is the gravity hammer from Halo 3. We made it 2D and focused the gameplay on the push-back effect when you swing the hammer in Halo. Using our mechanic, you can double jump and move  using that push-back force. 

Keyboard Controls:

WASD = Movement

Left Click = "Swing Hammer/Shoot"

Space = Jump

Gamepad Controls:

Left Thumbstick = Movement

Right Thumbstick = "Swing/Shoot Direction"

Right Trigger = "Swing Hammer/Shoot"

A = Jump
